instructions.en: Make a U-turn and continue on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Haz un cambio de sentido y continúe en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Haz un cambio de sentido y continúe en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Faire demi-tour et continuer sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.id: Putar balik ke arah Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fai un'inversione ad U poi continua su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Zawróć i jedź dalej Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça o retorno e continue em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Întoarceți-vă și continuați pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Развернитесь и продолжите движение по Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Gör en U-sväng och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Bir U-dönüşü yap ve Cool highway (Ref1) devam et
instructions.vi: Quẹo ngược lại trên Cool highway (Ref1)
